298770.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Series 30th Anniversary Contents
298770.description: To celebrate the 30th anniversary of the "Nobunaga's Ambition" series, we are proud to bring you a special set of additional content featuring an extra scenario, extra face stills and extra music. The scenario "Thirty Officers" features 30 mighty warriors, all vying for control of the land, while the face stills and music of previous titles in the series will be available to enjoy all over again. From us, to you, with our deepest thanks for 30 years of patronage.
